Name: Fairfax
Description: The Division of Fairfax consists of part of the Sunshine Coast Regional Council.
ProductsAndIndustry: Avocados, ginger, sugar cane, fruit juice, tropical and exotic fruits, dairy and beef cattle, tourism, health care, construction and infrastructure industries.
NameDerivation: Named in honour of Ruth Beatrice Fairfax OBE, 1878-1948, a founder of the Country Women's Association and its first Queensland president.
Members:
O'Brien, TC (LNQ) 2016-
Palmer, C (PUP) 2013-2016
Somlyay, A (LNQ) 1990-2013
Adermann, A E (NP) 1984-1990
DemographicRating: Rural - outside capital cities and without majority of enrolment in major provincial cities
